HEADLINE: Crompton Greaves Ltd has informed BSE regarding "Analyst Call - Q2 FY17 (Transcript)".

In continuation to our letter dated November 6, 2017 and pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the transcript of the Analyst Call held on Friday, November 10, 2017 at 10:00 am (IST).
